text:
Welcome to NoteMate! This is how your notes will look - simple, clean and aesthetic! üòç

NoteMate makes it easy to organize your thoughts and keep track of important ideas.
Quick Tip: You can change the color of your notes to categorize them by topic or priority. Try clicking the color palette icon when editing a note!

NoteMate supports multi-line text!

- Create to-do lists
- Save important ideas
- Organize your thoughts
- Set reminders for later
